scripts.prepare:compiler: test $(node -e "console.log(process.platform)") != "linux" && npm run --prefix ../ohos-sdk download || npm run install:toolchain --prefix ../tools/compiler
scripts.prepare:arm64: npm run prepare:compiler && npm run install:sysroot:arm64 --prefix ../tools/compiler
scripts.prepare:arm32: npm run prepare:compiler && npm run install:sysroot:arm32 --prefix ../tools/compiler
scripts.clean: ets-tsc -b . --clean && rimraf -g build dist lib generated native/build-* *.ini
scripts.configure:native-node-host: cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=node build-node-host
scripts.compile:native-node-host: npm run configure:native-node-host && cd native && meson compile -C build-node-host && meson install -C build-node-host
scripts.configure:native-hzvm-host: cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=hzvm build-hzvm-host
scripts.compile:native-hzvm-host: npm run configure:native-hzvm-host && cd native && meson compile -C build-hzvm-host && meson install -C build-hzvm-host
scripts.configure:native-panda-host: cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=panda build-panda-host
scripts.compile:native-panda-host: npm run configure:native-panda-host && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-host && meson install -C build-panda-host
scripts.configure:native-panda-ani-host: cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=panda-ani build-panda-ani-host
scripts.compile:native-panda-ani-host: npm run configure:native-panda-ani-host && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-ani-host && meson install -C build-panda-ani-host
scripts.compile:native-panda-linux-x64: npm run configure:native-panda-linux-x64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-linux-x64 && meson install -C build-panda-linux-x64
scripts.compile:native-panda-linux-arm64: npm run configure:native-panda-linux-arm64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-linux-arm64 && meson install -C build-panda-linux-arm64
scripts.compile:native-panda-windows-x64: npm run configure:native-panda-windows-x64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-windows-x64 && meson install -C build-panda-windows-x64
scripts.compile:native-panda-macos-x64: npm run configure:native-panda-macos-x64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-macos-x64 && meson install -C build-panda-macos-x64
scripts.compile:native-panda-macos-arm64: npm run configure:native-panda-macos-arm64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-macos-arm64 && meson install -C build-panda-macos-arm64
scripts.configure:native-jvm-host: cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=jvm build-jvm-host -D vmloader=true -D jdk_dir=$JAVA_HOME
scripts.compile:native-jvm-host: npm run configure:native-jvm-host && cd native && meson compile -C build-jvm-host && meson install -C build-jvm-host
scripts.configure:native-hzvm-ohos-arm64: npm run prepare:arm64 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs hzvm-ohos-arm64
scripts.compile:native-hzvm-ohos-arm64: npm run configure:native-hzvm-ohos-arm64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm64 && meson install -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm64
scripts.configure:native-hzvm-ohos-arm32: npm run prepare:arm32 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs hzvm-ohos-arm32
scripts.compile:native-hzvm-ohos-arm32: npm run configure:native-hzvm-ohos-arm32 && cd native && meson compile -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm32 && meson install -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm32
scripts.configure:native-panda-ohos-arm64: npm run prepare:arm64 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs panda-ohos-arm64
scripts.compile:native-panda-ohos-arm64: npm run configure:native-panda-ohos-arm64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-ohos-arm64 && meson install -C build-panda-ohos-arm64
scripts.configure:native-panda-ohos-arm32: npm run prepare:arm32 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs panda-ohos-arm32
scripts.compile:native-panda-ohos-arm32: npm run configure:native-panda-ohos-arm32 && cd native && meson compile -C build-panda-ohos-arm32 && meson install -C build-panda-ohos-arm32
scripts.configure:native-panda-with-node-host: npm run configure:native-panda-host && cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=node -D vmloader=true -D arkoala=false build-node-host-vmloader
scripts.compile:native-panda-with-node-host: npm run configure:native-panda-with-node-host && cd native && npm run compile:native-panda-host && npm run compile:native-panda-host && meson compile -C build-node-host-vmloader && meson install -C build-node-host-vmloader
scripts.configure:native-panda-ani-with-node-hos: npm run configure:native-panda-ani-host && cd native && meson setup -D vm_kind=node -D vmloader=true -D arkoala=false build-node-host-vmloader
scripts.compile:native-panda-ani-with-node-host: npm run configure:native-panda-ani-with-node-host && cd native && npm run compile:native-panda-ani-host && npm run compile:native-panda-ani-host && meson compile -C build-node-host-vmloader && meson install -C build-node-host-vmloader
scripts.configure:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-ar: npm run configure:native-panda-ohos-arm64 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs hzvm-ohos-arm64-vmloader
scripts.compile:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-arm6: npm run configure:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-arm64 && npm run compile:native-panda-ohos-arm64 && cd native && meson compile -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm64-vmloader && meson install -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm64-vmloader && npm run copy:libcpp:arm64 --prefix ../../tools/compiler
scripts.configure:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-ar: npm run configure:native-panda-ohos-arm32 && cd native && node ../scripts/configure.mjs hzvm-ohos-arm32-vmloader
scripts.compile:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-arm3: npm run configure:native-panda-with-hzvm-ohos-arm32 && npm run compile:native-panda-ohos-arm32 && cd native && meson compile -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm32-vmloader && meson install -C build-hzvm-ohos-arm32-vmloader && npm run copy:libcpp:arm32 --prefix ../../tools/compiler
